englishMeaning: The final part of a long or difficult activity.
turkishMeaning: Son düzlük, bir işin son aşaması.

englishMeaning: The most important fact in a situation; the summary or main point.
sampleSentenceInEnglish: Bottom line, today was an epic disaster.
sampleSentenceInTurkish: Sonuç olarak, bugün destansı bir felaketti.

englishMeaning: An Australian Aboriginal wind instrument in the form of a long wooden tube.
turkishMeaning: Didgeridoo (Avustralya Aborjinlerine özgü, uzun, ahşap bir üflemeli çalgı).

englishMeaning: A newly-coined slang term blending 'father' and 'mommy' to describe a stay-at-home dad who takes on roles traditionally associated with a mother.
turkishMeaning: 'Baba' ve 'anne' kelimelerinin birleşiminden oluşan, evde kalıp geleneksel anne rollerini üstlenen baba anlamına gelen yeni bir argo terim; 'babanne'.
sampleSentenceInEnglish: I think that it's so cool when a guy can step up to be a full-time fommy.
sampleSentenceInTurkish: Bence bir erkeğin sorumluluk alıp tam zamanlı bir 'babanne' olabilmesi çok havalı.

englishMeaning: Happening or being chosen automatically because no other alternative has been selected or is available.
turkishMeaning: Mecburen, varsayılan olarak, başka seçenek olmadığından.
sampleSentenceInEnglish: Um, yeah, I guess I'm sort of a fommy by default.
sampleSentenceInTurkish: Evet, sanırım mecburen bir nevi 'babanne' oldum.

englishMeaning: A corporate euphemism (a mild or indirect word substituted for one considered to be too harsh) for being laid off or fired from a job.
sampleSentenceInEnglish: I was in aerospace, and I got transitioned out of my job.
sampleSentenceInTurkish: Havacılık ve uzay sektöründeydim ve işten çıkarıldım.

englishMeaning: The character is sarcastically suggesting that the driver of the small, stylish car is trying to make an ironic statement, perhaps implying they are a hipster or trying too hard to be cool.
turkishMeaning: İronik Mini Cooper (küçük ve şık bir araba kullanan kişinin havalı olmak için ironik bir tavır takındığını ima eden alaycı bir ifade).
sampleSentenceInEnglish: Excuse me, sir, in the ironic Mini Cooper!
sampleSentenceInTurkish: Affedersiniz bayım, o ironik Mini Cooper'ın içindeki!

englishMeaning: A metaphorical command, likely from marching band or military jargon, meaning to create a space or an opening in a line for someone to pass through.
turkishMeaning: Yol açmak, geçmek için bir boşluk oluşturmak.
sampleSentenceInEnglish: Let's go! Fold in. Woodwinds, make a window!
sampleSentenceInTurkish: Hadi! Sıraya girin. Nefesliler, yol açın!

englishMeaning: A metaphorical expression used to describe a day where everything seems to be going wrong, as if it is under a magic spell causing bad luck.
An idiom meaning to stop or cancel a project or initiative.
sampleSentenceInEnglish: We just pulled the plug on publication.
